newsitem.title: SINGAPORE: Singapore Jan retail sales rise 10.1 pct on year.
newsitem.headline: Singapore Jan retail sales rise 10.1 pct on year.

text.p: Singapore's January retail sales index (base 1991) rose 10.1 percent compared to a year ago, the Department of Statistics said on wednesday.
The figures showed an improvement of 1.9 percent over December 1996 sales.
Excluding motor vehicles, the index registered a month-on-month decline of 1.0 percent in January.
January retail sales were estimated at Singapore $2.50 billion. The statistics department said that year-on-year, at constant prices, the retail index rose by 11.2 percent.
